user_review: On this sunny day I was on St-Laurent and craving pizza so it was a sign to stop and order.I have passed by the locations in Old port and Mile-End many times and always have been fascinated by the concept and the cool decor which is incomparable to many pizza joints which I will not name ;-)My boccocini and basil pizza was definitely a hit. Thin crust oven baked topped with Italian tomato sauce,Boccocini and basil, what can I say! Service was great :-)If you're in the hood and craving a good pizza, you know where to stop. Bon app√©tit!
